attributes.additional_details:
Each year billions of male birds die as they cannot lay eggs. Often brought into the world to be killed hours later. The males are hatched then kept for a couple of hours or days before they are sexed and then they are GASSED. Yes gassed! Her is a link to a video where 40 million chicks went on a conveyor belt to death.
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/earth/earthnews/8107957/40-million-chicks-on-conveyor-belt-to-death.html
We should put rules in place to stop this horrible thing happening. Stop people from mass killing animals. How would you like it if your baby was born to be killed?
We need to put a stop to this!
Please help us put a stop to this!
Sign this NOW!
